thread.title: Tanya Peterson, Lynxspring, Inc.
thread.title_full: Thread Logic reviewed by Tanya Peterson, Lynxspring, Inc.

author: Tanya Peterson, Lynxspring, Inc.
title: Tanya Peterson, Lynxspring, Inc.
text: Thread Logic was responsive to changes to my order, and friendly to work with. We just received our shirts and the turnaround was both quick and quality work. We would definitely recommend using Thread Logic and plan to use them for all of our logo apparel needs for our company!
